description: Detects scenarios where an windows defender exclusion was added in registry where an entity would want to bypass antivirus scanning from windows defender Author: @BarryShooshooga. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows Defender Exclusion Set
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:("4657" OR "4656" OR "4660" OR "4663") AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Exclusions\\*)
